gym_kusa_020_receptionist_01:
Welcome to the Artazon Gym! Would you like
me to explain the rules of the Gym Test again?
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_02: The Gym Test here is [clr:6]Sunflora Hide-and-Seek[clr:0]!
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_03:
Find [num2:1] of the sunflower-shaped Pokémon
Sunflora throughout Artazon, then bring them\r
to the Sunflora Lawn to pass the test.
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_04:
You’ve gathered [num1:1] of them so far, so that means
you have [num2:2] left to find.
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_05:
They may be hidden away up high or in other
unexpected places, like around the backs of\r
buildings. Make sure to look all around!
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_09:
Once you’ve gathered 10 Sunflora, please bring
them over to the Sunflora Lawn!
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_01:
You found a Sunflora!\c
The Sunflora will now follow you around.
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_13: The Sunflora will follow you now!
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_05:
You found a Sunflora!\c
You’ve gathered [num2:1] in total! Time to bring them
to the Sunflora Lawn.
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_14:
You’ve gathered [num2:1] Sunflora in total! Make sure
to bring them to the Sunflora Lawn.
gym_kusa_020_keeper_01: Hi there! I look after the Artazon Gym’s Sunflora.
gym_kusa_020_keeper_06:
I hope you’re ready, challenger. It’s time for a
game of Sunflora Hide-and-Seek!\c
I’ll go ahead and ask the Sunflora to spread
themselves out around town!
gym_kusa_020_keeper_09: Sounds like the Sunflora are ready for you!
gym_kusa_020_keeper_10:
With that, your Gym Test has now begun!\c
Once you’ve found [num2:1] Sunflora, please bring
them back here to the Sunflora Lawn.
gym_kusa_020_keeper_11: That’s all from me, now! Good luck out there!
gym_kusa_020_keeper_02:
It looks like you have [num2:1] Sunflora with you
right now.
gym_kusa_020_keeper_03:
Once you’ve found [num2:2] of them, please bring
them back here!
gym_kusa_020_keeper_04:
Well done on finding all these Sunflora! You pass
the Gym Test with flying colors.
gym_kusa_020_keeper_05:
Now, please head back to the lobby at the
Artazon Gym to report your result.
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_06:
Would you like to take on the Gym Test again
and seek out some Sunflora?
gym_kusa_020_receptionist_07:
Just like before, please find [num2:1] Sunflora and
bring them back here to the Sunflora Lawn.
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_10:
If you leave Artazon, you’ll have to start Sunflora
Hide-and-Seek all over again next time.\r
Do you still want to leave the town?
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_11:
You quit the Gym Test!\c
If you want to try again, go to the Sunflora Lawn.
gym_kusa_020_kusapoke_12:
Are you sure you want to give up and quit
playing Sunflora Hide-and-Seek?
